title: Pipeline Leak Detection Alert
description: A control room operator receives an alert from the leak detection system and must verify if it's a real leak or a false alarm.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the high-priority leak alarm for pipeline segment PL-789.
tasks.expected_outcome: The alarm is acknowledged in the SCADA system.

tasks.description: Analyze real-time and historical pressure and flow rate data upstream and downstream of the alarm location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator identifies a pressure drop and flow mismatch indicative of a real leak.

tasks.description: Initiate the emergency shutdown procedure for the affected pipeline segment and dispatch a field crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: The pipeline segment is safely isolated, and a crew is dispatched to the location.
